tool_description: Generates comprehensive audit reports on RBAC system status, user permissions, role assignments, and compliance metrics for security monitoring and governance.

report_type.description: Type of audit report: user_permissions, role_assignments, permission_usage, compliance_summary, security_violations, full_audit

date_range_start.description: Start date for the audit period

date_range_end.description: End date for the audit period

include_inactive.description: Whether to include inactive users and roles

filter_departments.description: Specific departments to include in the report

detail_level.description: Report detail level: summary, detailed, comprehensive

error_messages: Invalid report type: Use one of [user_permissions, role_assignments, permission_usage, compliance_summary, security_violations, full_audit].
Invalid date range: Start date must be before end date and both must be valid ISO 8601 format.
Invalid detail level: Use one of [summary, detailed, comprehensive].
No data found: No audit data exists for the specified date range and filters.
usage: Generate audit reports by specifying report_type, date_range_start, and date_range_end. Use filters and detail_level to customize the report scope and depth.

report_id.description: Unique identifier for the generated report

total_users.description: Total number of users covered in the report

recommendations.description: List of recommended actions based on audit findings
